nodes.documentation:
@title MatryxRound - A round within a Matryx tournament.
 @author Max Howard - <max@nanome.ai>, Sam Hessenauer - <sam@nanome.ai>
nodes.name: MatryxRound

nodes.documentation: @dev Requires that this round is in the open submission state.
nodes.name: duringOpenSubmission

nodes.documentation: @dev Requires that this round is in the winner selection state.
nodes.name: duringReviewPeriod

nodes.documentation: @dev Requires that the desired submission is accessible to the requester.
nodes.name: whenAccessible

nodes.documentation: @dev Requires the function caller to be the platform or the owner of this tournament
nodes.name: onlySubmissionAuthor
setContractAddress
getContractAddress
submissionIsAccessible
submissionIsAccessible
requesterIsContributor

nodes.documentation:
@dev Returns all submissions made to this round.
 @return _submissions All submissions made to this round.
nodes.name: getSubmissions
getSubmissionAuthor
getBalance

nodes.documentation:
@dev Returns whether or not a winning submission has been chosen.
 @return Whether or not a submission has been chosen.
nodes.name: submissionsChosen

nodes.documentation:
@dev Returns the index of this round's winning submission.
 @return Index of the winning submission.
nodes.name: getWinningSubmissionAddresses

nodes.documentation:
@dev Returns the number of submissions made to this round.
 @return Number of submissions made to this round.
nodes.name: numberOfSubmissions
scheduleStart

nodes.documentation: @dev Allows the tournament to edit the
nodes.name: editRound
selectWinningSubmissions

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (address[] memory,uint128[] memory,address[] memory,struct LibConstruction.RequiredSubmissionAddresses memory,struct LibConstruction.SubmissionData memory) external returns (address)

nodes.name: createSubmission

nodes.documentation: @dev Allows contributors to withdraw a portion of the round bounty if the round has been abandoned.
nodes.name: transferBountyToTournament
